summary: A seemingly idiotic fop is really the courageous vigilante Zorro, who seeks to protect the oppressed.
cast: Marguerite De La Motte|Robert McKim|Noah Beery|Charles Hill Mailes|Claire McDowell|Snitz Edwards|Sidney De Gray|George Periolat|Walt Whitman|Tote Du Crow|Douglas Fairbanks|Noah Beery Jr.|Charles Belcher|Milton Berle|Manuel Caballero|Gilbert Clayton|Albert MacQuarrie|Charles Stevens|Jack Tornek|John Winn
title: La marca del Zorro
